nodes.text: Tail stinger wraps were items used by dark wolf handlers; dark wolves had a Tripion-like stinger on their tails. Alliance operative and dark wolf handler Adazian Liebke carried several tail stinger wraps with him.

Tail stinger wraps were listed as part of the equipment carried by Adazian Liebke in "The Greel Wood Haven" but their use was not expanded on. As Liebke also carried dark wolf muzzles and was an experienced dark wolf handler, coupled with the fact that dark wolves were noted for their stinger tails, it is reasonable to assume that tail stinger wraps are equipment used with the handling of these beasts.
